name: @svelte-put/dragscroll
description: Enable drag-to-scroll behavior in Svelte applications.
readme:
# `@svelte-put/dragscroll` [![npm.badge]][npm] [![bundlephobia.badge]][bundlephobia] [![docs.badge]][docs] Svelte action `use:dragscroll` for pointer drag-to-scroll behavior
